page.title: 04DENMAN COLLEGE: COURSES
page.content: {Denman College} has courses for England and Wales. They have a weekly course and a weekend course. The weekly course is for people with no children mainly. It costs 70 pounds for a week per person. A weekend course is for people with children and a husband . When the wife is on the course her husband looks after the children. A weekend course costs just under 35 pounds per person. There are on average 70 students a week. On average they get 4,500 students a year. Some of these come to learn themselves. Some come to learn to teach others. The college employs 32 people from the village. We go there a lot from school. They have a great nature trail.
